name: VAA

dtgValue.description: Date and time of origin YYYYMMDD/HHmmZ

psnValue.description: Volcano position Nnnnn/Snnnn Wnnnnn/Ennnnn or UNKNOWN

summitValue.description: Summit elevation in metres or feet, or SFC/UNKNOWN

infoSourceValue.description: Information source (free text up to 32 characters)

eruptionValue.description: Eruption details (free text up to 64 characters) or UNKNOWN

vaNotIdentifiable.description: VA not identifiable from satellite data

flightLevelTop.description: Top of ash cloud flight level

wideLine.pattern: ^\d{1,3}KM WID LINE BTN$|^\d{1,3}NM WID LINE BTN$

coordinate.description: Geographic coordinate Nnn[nn] Wnnn[nn] or Snn[nn] Ennn[nn]

windLayer.description: Wind layer for VA not identifiable

fcstDtgValue.description: Forecast valid day and time DD/HHmmZ

nxtAdvisoryNoFurther.description: No further advisories will be issued

nxtAdvisoryWillBeIssued.description: Advisory will be issued by date/time

editable.defaultsFunction: () => { const now = new Date(); const y = now.getUTCFullYear(); const m = String(now.getUTCMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); const d = String(now.getUTCDate()).padStart(2, '0'); const h = String(now.getUTCHours()).padStart(2, '0'); const min = String(now.getUTCMinutes()).padStart(2, '0'); return [y + m + d + '/' + h + min + 'Z']; }

declarations.description: Red - Eruption imminent or underway with significant ash emission
Orange - Heightened volcanic activity with increased potential for eruption
Yellow - Volcano is exhibiting elevated unrest above known background levels
Green - Volcano is in normal, non-eruptive state

editable.defaultsFunction: () => { const now = new Date(); const d = String(now.getUTCDate()).padStart(2, '0'); const h = String(now.getUTCHours()).padStart(2, '0'); const min = String(now.getUTCMinutes()).padStart(2, '0'); return [d + '/' + h + min + 'Z']; }

() => { const now = new Date(); const d = String(now.getUTCDate()).padStart(2, '0'); const h = String(now.getUTCHours()).padStart(2, '0'); const min = String(now.getUTCMinutes()).padStart(2, '0'); return [d + '/' + h + min + 'Z']; }

declarations.text: VA NOT IDENTIFIABLE FM SATELLITE DATA
VA NOT IDENTIFIABLE FM SATELLITE DATA

editable.defaultsFunction: () => { const now = new Date(Date.now() + 6*60*60*1000); const d = String(now.getUTCDate()).padStart(2, '0'); const h = String(now.getUTCHours()).padStart(2, '0'); const min = '00'; return [d + '/' + h + min + 'Z']; }

() => { const now = new Date(Date.now() + 12*60*60*1000); const d = String(now.getUTCDate()).padStart(2, '0'); const h = String(now.getUTCHours()).padStart(2, '0'); const min = '00'; return [d + '/' + h + min + 'Z']; }

() => { const now = new Date(Date.now() + 18*60*60*1000); const d = String(now.getUTCDate()).padStart(2, '0'); const h = String(now.getUTCHours()).padStart(2, '0'); const min = '00'; return [d + '/' + h + min + 'Z']; }

declarations.placeholder: LATEST REP FM KVERT INDICATES ERUPTION HAS CEASED

editable.defaultsFunction: () => { const now = new Date(Date.now() + 6*60*60*1000); const y = now.getUTCFullYear(); const m = String(now.getUTCMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); const d = String(now.getUTCDate()).padStart(2, '0'); const h = String(now.getUTCHours()).padStart(2, '0'); return [y + m + d + '/' + h + '00Z']; }

colourCodes.RED: Eruption is imminent or underway with significant emission of ash into the atmosphere, or eruption is underway with no or minor ash emission but it has potential to increase significantly
colourCodes.ORANGE: Volcano is exhibiting heightened or escalating unrest with increased potential of eruption, or volcanic eruption underway with no or minor ash emission
colourCodes.YELLOW: Volcano is experiencing elevated unrest above known background level, or after a higher level alert, volcanic activity has decreased significantly but continues to be closely monitored
colourCodes.GREEN: Volcano is in normal, non-eruptive state, or after a change from a higher alert level, volcanic activity has ceased

examples:
VA ADVISORY
DTG: 20080923/0130Z
VAAC: TOKYO
VOLCANO: KARYMSKY 300130
PSN: N5403 E15927
AREA: RUSSIA
SUMMIT ELEV: 1536M
ADVISORY NR: 2008/4
INFO SOURCE: HIMAWARI-8 KVERT KEMSD
AVIATION COLOUR CODE: RED
ERUPTION DETAILS: ERUPTION AT 20080923/0000Z FL300 REPORTED
OBS VA DTG: 23/0100Z
OBS VA CLD: FL250/300 N5400 E15930 - N5400 E16100 - N5300 E15945 MOV SE 20KT SFC/FL200 N5130 E16130 - N5130 E16230 - N5230 E16230 - N5230 E16130 MOV SE 15KT
FCST VA CLD +6 HR: 23/0700Z FL250/350 N5130 E16030 - N5130 E16230 - N5330 E16230 - N5330 E16030 SFC/FL180 N4830 E16330 - N4830 E16630 - N5130 E16630 - N5130 E16330
FCST VA CLD +12 HR: 23/1300Z SFC/FL270 N4830 E16130 - N4830 E16600 - N5300 E16600 - N5300 E16130
FCST VA CLD +18 HR: 23/1900Z NO VA EXP
RMK: LATEST REP FM KVERT (0120Z) INDICATES ERUPTION HAS CEASED. TWO DISPERSING VA CLD ARE EVIDENT ON SATELLITE IMAGERY
NXT ADVISORY: 20080923/0730Z
